name: CEMEX, S.A.B. de C.V.
goal: CEMEX, S.A.B. de C.V. is a global leader in the building materials industry that provides high-quality products and reliable service to customers and communities worldwide. We aim to serve the needs of our customers and create value for our stakeholders by becoming the world's most efficient and innovative building materials company.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Internal Market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Industrial policy and competitiveness.Environmental regulation and climate change policies, in particular the EU ETS and carbon leakage. The Market Stability Reserve (MSR), and the 2030 Climate and Energy Package including revision to the ETS. Waste policy and in particular the Circular Economy (industrial symbiosis) and revision of of the waste framework directive. Shipment of waste. Energy policy, the Energy Union, industrial energy efficiency and energy performance of buildings. Sustainable construction. Infrastructure and housing. Standards including work on CE marking of products. Critical raw materials used in our manufacturing processes. Transport issues including vehicle safety, vulnerable road users and air quality (Euro 6 etc.). Trade policy. Biodiversity and ecosystems policy including the Birds and Habitats Directives. Competition policy. Trade policy and relations with Russia
